basics.name: Bruno Justino Garcia Praciano
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: My first contact with programming for commercial purposes was when I developed a software for a concentrator in Raspberry Pi, where I worked at Laboratory of Biomedical Engineering of the University of Brasília. With this work I was able to publish in the Brazilian Congress of Biomedical Engineering. I am currently web developer and CTO of a start up in the capital of Brazil. I am javascript enthusiast and laravel. My favorite area is the health care, my final graduation project is with that focus.

work.summary: Development of REST API using Laravel and frontend using Vue. Flow diagram of deploy, AWS server management, maintenance the database and use SCRUM for projects. Performing unit tests and automation using Jenkins and Chef.
Creation of databases in Amazon Web Services, consultation with statistical purposes using SQLServer, project documentation support to the systems implemented and the software

Welding of Printed Circuit Boards (PCI's), Embedded software development with RaspberryPI, Arduino programming, manipulation of databases, use of methodology SCRUM for project management, development Web platform and mobile application (iOs / Android) for outpatient treatment, treatment of data analysis, statistical analysis by means of SQL scripts, code refactoring in HTML, unit tests. Web Development using Ruby on Rails. Participant of the Rapha, Vera and Soquete Projects.
